hanzi-su-wiki:
郵

Значения

Почта

Мнемоника

Свешиваться 垂 на ходу с седла к городской стене ⻏ для передачи срочных донесений.

Варианты

邮

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 邮)
Pictophonetic: 垂 indicates the sound; 阝 (place) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
郵票 [ yóu piào ]: (postage) stamp; Classifiers: 枚
郵政 [ yóu zhèng ]: postal service; postal
郵件 [ yóu jiàn ]: mail; post; email
郵局 [ yóu jú ]: post office; Classifiers: 家
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 垂 [ chuí ] to hang, to dangle; to hand down, to bequeath; almost, near
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
heisig_chinese_memo: The drooping city walls were generating a lot of angry post for the city officials.
koohiiStory1: The drooping citywalls was generating a lot of angry mail for the city officials. Hint: think "hate mail" and you will remember this one. [thx CharleyGarrett].
koohiiStory2: The city walls droop down in one spot so that the mailtman can throw the mail over.
jp_example_words:
郵送(ゆうそう): mailing
郵便(ゆうびん): mail, postal service
郵便局(ゆうびんきょく): post office
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A broken car sits in a building. You need to get rid of it, so you mail it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You just put some postage on it and watch the mail carrier take it away like any other piece of mail.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Who did you address this broken car mail to? You sent it to the youths (ゆう) of the world.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You figure youths don't have cars anymore, so they could use one. Ugh, youths these days and their ride share apps.
Ru_trainchinese:
yóu: (глаг) отправлять, посылать (почтой)
yóu: (графема) почта; почтовый; почтовая марка
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the group (⻏) suspends (垂) the mail
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The mailman sprouts up every morning within the city walls to post your mail.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " yup " to " down ", the original meaning is an inn, that is, a place used as a rest during the ancient transfer of documents, officials, and transportation. "Said Wen": "Postal, the border is up to the bookstore. From the town, down. Down, the side." Such as "Mencius. "Gongsun Chou Shang": "The popularity of virtue is passed on by mail." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. The Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" Jane 2-3: "Near county magistrates do their books lightly, and far county magistrates post them." It means that the county is close, and the documents are delivered by people who travel quickly, and the county is far away. Delivered by the post.

" Post " also means the person who sends the document. Such as "Han Shu. "Beijing Fang Chuan": "Fang Yi is more afraid, go to Xinfeng, because of the postal seal." Yan Shigu's note: "Postal, the book is also." "Shi Shuo Xinyu. "Ren Dan": "The sinker sinks, and the floater floats. Yin Hongqiao cannot write a letter or post."

The extension of " post " refers to the process of document delivery, namely mailing and postal delivery. For example, Huangfu Mei of the Tang Dynasty "Sanshui Small Tablet. Volume 2": "(Li Yue) is willing to do good deeds quickly, so I often send postal books to Beijing." "Ming History. "Wang Sanshan Biography": "I don’t know the west of Zexi, crossing the Luguang River, the road for birds, the deep forest and Congqing, he tempted me to go deep, block the road with wood and stone, cut off his postal book, obstruct the road, and cover the teacher. Pawn, it doesn't take a shot, and our soldiers are already stuck."

" Post " also means a farm house. "Ji Yun. "You Yun": "Postal, Field House." Such as "Book of Rites. Special Sacrifice in the Suburbs: "Food farmers and postal tables, beasts, benevolence, and righteousness." Kong Yingdashu: "Postal tables are the place where the fields are located in the wells. Posts are like the premises of the post pavilion. Table, Fieldside. Nawate means that the paddle is connected by the well. The place where the paddle is connected by the field bank, builds this post house, and the paddle is located at the paddle."

" Post " can be connected to " You ". Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Bin Zhi Chu Yan": "It is said that I am drunk, and I don't know its post." Zheng Xuanjian: "Post, pass." " Post " means sin. Another example is "Xunzi. "Yibing": "There is one sentence for one person and the whole world serves it. The sinner does not post it, but he who is convicted is himself." Yang Jie's note: "Posting, resentment." " Posting " means resentment.
humanum_short_description_en: From " yup " to " down ", the original meaning is an inn, that is, a place used as a rest during ancient times to pass documents and officials to live and transport.
humanum_full_description:
從「邑」從「垂」，本義是驛站，即古代傳遞文書、官員來住及運輸時用作中途休息的地方。《說文》：「郵，境上行書舍。从邑、垂。垂，邊也。」如《孟子．公孫丑上》：「德之流行，速於置郵而傳命。」《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡2-3：「近縣令輕足行其書，遠縣令郵行之。」意謂距離近的縣，文書由走得快的人專程遞送，距離遠的縣由驛站傳送。

　　「郵」也表示傳送文書的人。如《漢書．京房傳》：「房意愈恐，去至新豐，因郵上封事。」顏師古注：「郵，行書者也。」《世說新語．任誕》：「沉者自沉，浮者自浮，殷洪喬不能作致書郵。」

　　「郵」引申表示文書傳遞的過程，即郵寄、郵遞。如唐代皇甫枚《三水小牘．卷下》：「（李約）願捷善行，故常令郵書入京。」《明史．王三善傳》：「不知澤溪以西，渡陸廣河，皆鳥道，深林叢箐，彼誘我深入，以木石塞路，斷其郵書，阻餉道，遮援師，則彼不勞一卒，不費一矢，而我兵已坐困矣。」

　　「郵」還表示田間屋舍。《集韻．尤韻》：「郵，田間舍。」如《禮記．郊特牲》：「饗農及郵表畷、禽獸，仁之至，義之盡也。」孔穎達疏：「郵表畷者，是田畯於井間舍之處。郵若郵亭屋宇處所。表，田畔。畷者，謂井畔相連畷。於此田畔相連畷之所，造此郵舍，田畯處焉。」

　　「郵」可通「尤」。如《詩．小雅．賓之初筵》：「是曰既醉，不知其郵。」鄭玄箋：「郵，過。」「郵」表示罪過。又如《荀子．議兵》：「故刑一人而天下服，罪人不郵其上，知罪之在己也。」楊倞注：「郵，怨也。」 「郵」表示怨恨。
humanum_short_description: 從「邑」從「垂」，本義是驛站，即古代傳遞文書、官員來住及運輸時用作中途休息的地方。

郵送(ゆうそう): mailing
郵便(ゆうびん): mail, postal service
郵便局(ゆうびんきょく): post office

從「 邑 」從「 垂 」，本義是驛站，即古代傳遞文書、官員來住及運輸時用作中途休息的地方。《說文》：「郵，境上行書舍。从邑、垂。垂，邊也。」如《孟子．公孫丑上》：「德之流行，速於置郵而傳命。」《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡2-3：「近縣令輕足行其書，遠縣令郵行之。」意謂距離近的縣，文書由走得快的人專程遞送，距離遠的縣由驛站傳送。 「 郵 」也表示傳送文書的人。如《漢書．京房傳》：「房意愈恐，去至新豐，因郵上封事。」顏師古注：「郵，行書者也。」《世說新語．任誕》：「沉者自沉，浮者自浮，殷洪喬不能作致書郵。」 「 郵 」引申表示文書傳遞的過程，即郵寄、郵遞。如唐代皇甫枚《三水小牘．卷下》：「（李約）願捷善行，故常令郵書入京。」《明史．王三善傳》：「不知澤溪以西，渡陸廣河，皆鳥道，深林叢箐，彼誘我深入，以木石塞路，斷其郵書，阻餉道，遮援師，則彼不勞一卒，不費一矢，而我兵已坐困矣。」 「 郵 」還表示田間屋舍。《集韻．尤韻》：「郵，田間舍。」如《禮記．郊特牲》：「饗農及郵表畷、禽獸，仁之至，義之盡也。」孔穎達疏：「郵表畷者，是田畯於井間舍之處。郵若郵亭屋宇處所。表，田畔。畷者，謂井畔相連畷。於此田畔相連畷之所，造此郵舍，田畯處焉。」 「 郵 」可通「 尤 」。如《詩．小雅．賓之初筵》：「是曰既醉，不知其郵。」鄭玄箋：「郵，過。」「 郵 」表示罪過。又如《荀子．議兵》：「故刑一人而天下服，罪人不郵其上，知罪之在己也。」楊倞注：「郵，怨也。」 「 郵 」表示怨恨。
From " yup" to " down", the original meaning is an inn, that is, a place used as a rest during the ancient transfer of documents, officials, and transportation. "Said Wen": "Postal, the border is up to the bookstore. From the town, down. Down, the side." Such as "Mencius. "Gongsun Chou Shang": "The popularity of virtue is passed on by mail." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. The Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" Jane 2-3: "Near county magistrates do their books lightly, and far county magistrates post them." It means that the county is close, and the documents are delivered by people who travel quickly, and the county is far away. Delivered by the post. " Post" also means the person who sends the document. Such as "Han Shu. "Beijing Fang Chuan": "Fang Yi is more afraid, go to Xinfeng, because of the postal seal." Yan Shigu's note: "Postal, the book is also." "Shi Shuo Xinyu. "Ren Dan": "The sinker sinks, and the floater floats. Yin Hongqiao cannot write a letter or post." The extension of " post" refers to the process of document delivery, namely mailing and postal delivery. For example, Huangfu Mei of the Tang Dynasty "Sanshui Small Tablet. Volume 2": "(Li Yue) is willing to do good deeds quickly, so I often send postal books to Beijing." "Ming History. "Wang Sanshan Biography": "I don’t know the west of Zexi, crossing the Luguang River, the road for birds, the deep forest and Congqing, he tempted me to go deep, block the road with wood and stone, cut off his postal book, obstruct the road, and cover the teacher. Pawn, it doesn't take a shot, and our soldiers are already stuck." " Post" also means a farm house. "Ji Yun. "You Yun": "Postal, Field House." Such as "Book of Rites. Special Sacrifice in the Suburbs: "Food farmers and postal tables, beasts, benevolence, and righteousness." Kong Yingdashu: "Postal tables are the place where the fields are located in the wells. Posts are like the premises of the post pavilion. Table, Fieldside. Nawate means that the paddle is connected by the well. The place where the paddle is connected by the field bank, builds this post house, and the paddle is located at the paddle." " Post" can be connected to " You". Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Bin Zhi Chu Yan": "It is said that I am drunk, and I don't know its post." Zheng Xuanjian: "Post, pass." " Post" means sin. Another example is "Xunzi. "Yibing": "There is one sentence for one person and the whole world serves it. The sinner does not post it, but he who is convicted is himself." Yang Jie's note: "Posting, resentment." 郵字的基本解释

郵
yóu
见“邮”。

郵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yóu］
［《廣韻》羽求切，平尤，云。］
(1)驿站。古时设在沿途，供出巡的官员、传送文书的小吏和旅客歇宿的馆舍。马传曰置，步传曰邮。
(2)指传送文书的人。
(3)传送；邮寄。
(4)有关邮务的。
(5)古代井田间田官督耕所居的庐舍。
(6)通“尤”。过失，罪过。
(7)通“尤”。怨恨。
(8)通“尤”。最甚；最突出。
(9)通“由”。路径。
(10)用同“陲”。边陲。
(11)姓。春秋晋有邮无（邮良）。见《左传·哀公二年》。

郵字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郵； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1273第24
【唐韻】羽求切【集韻】【正韻】于求切，?音尤。【說文】境上行書舍也。【廣韻】郵，驛也。【風俗通】漢攺郵爲置，置亦驛也，度其遠近置之也。【增韻】馬傳曰置，步傳曰郵。【爾雅·釋言】郵，過也。【註】道路所經過也。　又【集韻】田閒舍也。【禮·郊特牲】郵表畷。【註】郵若郵亭，謂田畯于田畔相連畷處造亭居之，以督民之耕也。　又【正韻】過也。與尤通。【禮·王制】郵罰麗于事。【註】郵，過也。麗，附也。過人、罰人，當各附于其事，不可假他以喜怒也。【前漢·成帝紀】以顯朕郵。　又【正韻】最也。殿最亦曰殿郵。【列子·穆王篇】魯之君子，迷之郵者。【註】郵，與尤同。　又【廣韻】督郵，古官號。【釋名】主諸縣罰負郵殿糾攝之。【晉書·陶潛傳】郡遣督郵至縣。　又高郵，州名。　又姓。【左傳·哀二年】有郵無恤。　又【集韻】是爲切，音垂。地名。在衞。　又叶于其切，音移。【詩·小雅】不知其郵。叶上僛。　【正字通】《說文》本作?。从?。?，遠邊也。俗省作郵、?。【集韻】作缷。

郵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

暂无。

mail
Basic explanation of words
mail
yóu
See "Postal".
mail
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yóu］
["Guang Yun" Yu Qiqi, Ping You, Yun. ]
(1) Post station. In ancient times, it was set up along the route, where it was used by officials on patrols, small officials who sent documents, and tourists to sleep in. Ma Chuan said to set, step Chuan said to post.
(2) Refers to the person who transmits the document.
(3) Transmission; post.
(4) Related to postal services.
(5) The cottage where the officials in the ancient mine field lived for the farmer.
(6) Through "you". Negligence, sin.
(7) Through "you". resentment.
(8) Through "you". The most; the most prominent.
(9) Through "you". path.
(10) Use the same as "陲". Border.
(11) Last name. There is no post in the Spring and Autumn Period (youliang). See "Zuo Zhuan·Ai Gong Two Years".
mail
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words

Name meaning

yóu
вм. 邮
Radicals: 車, 阝  (car, building)
Meaning Mnemonic
A broken car sits in a building. You need to get rid of it, so you mail it.
You just put some postage on it and watch the mail carrier take it away like any other piece of mail.
Reading Mnemonic
Who did you address this broken car mail to? You sent it to the youths (ゆう) of the world.
You figure youths don't have cars anymore, so they could use one. Ugh, youths these days and their ride share apps.
